response.original_title: What if there is nothing in the end
response.overview: Disillusioned by years of losing patients, weary ambulance driver Alex quits his job and embarks on a road trip in search of meaning. Along the way, encounters with strangers. A hitchhiker, a trucker, and a runaway teen, reveal quiet truths about time, loss, and presence. As the miles pass, Alex learns that lifeâ€™s answers may not lie in the destination, but in the journey itself.
response.title: What if there is nothing in the end
